title: Mailbag 2.0 (Ep. 139)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald answer your questions on topics including pleas to review shows like 'The Expanse' and 'The Missing' (1:00), insider questions about the industry and the state of television (27:00), and Chris’s love of magic (37:25).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
